language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
annotation: M: alewa La: bàlar Le: gàlang

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: wide and flat, or just flat surface
could be space after first u
The distinction between those two words seems to be related to syntactic purposes as well
